titles.title: To modify certain vesting requirements for Railroad Retirement annuities.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure, and in addition to the Committee on Ways and Means, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to House Transportation and Infrastructure
Referred to House Ways and Means
Referred to the Subcommittee on Highways and Transit.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Social Security.

bill.summary: 5/16/2001--Introduced. Reduces a vesting requirement for certain annuities under the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 from ten to five years of service, subject to treatment as distributions from an individual retirement plan.
